# this is the build file for project GameEngine
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(GameEngine VERSION 0.1.0 LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_library(game_engine STATIC "")
set_target_properties(game_engine PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "game_engine")
set_target_properties(game_engine PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/arm64/release")
target_include_directories(game_engine PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(game_engine INTERFACE
    include
)
target_include_directories(game_engine SYSTEM PRIVATE
    /Users/alexischangridel/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/3ce34c98157445c898b9d2bf71391976/include
    /Users/alexischangridel/.xmake/packages/g/glad/v0.1.36/b9aabdf137ee4a559638b73910de1f9d/include
    /Users/alexischangridel/.xmake/packages/g/glm/0.9.9+8/96c3bd80cd30491490e3720040823000/include
    /Users/alexischangridel/.conan2/p/b/spdlo7f4174cde3d73/p/include
    /Users/alexischangridel/.conan2/p/b/fmt091f5cc7d47ee/p/include
    /Users/alexischangridel/.conan2/p/dia0f6529019f9b/p/include
    /Users/alexischangridel/.xmake/packages/e/entt/v3.13.1/038bc52dfbed4cc58e060b88c0894b62/include
)
target_compile_definitions(game_engine PRIVATE
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
    GL_SILENCE_DEPRECATION
    SPDLOG_FMT_EXTERNAL
    SPDLOG_COMPILED_LIB
    BOOST_DI_CFG_DIAGNOSTICS_LEVEL=1
)
target_compile_options(game_engine PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:arm64-apple-macos14.5>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:arm64-apple-macos14.5>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.5.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.5.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(game_engine PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(game_engine PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(game_engine PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(game_engine PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(game_engine PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET game_engine PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(game_engine PRIVATE
    glfw3
    glad
    spdlog
    fmt
    "-framework Cocoa"
    "-framework IOKit"
    "-framework OpenGL"
)
target_link_directories(game_engine PRIVATE
    /Users/alexischangridel/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/3ce34c98157445c898b9d2bf71391976/lib
    /Users/alexischangridel/.xmake/packages/g/glad/v0.1.36/b9aabdf137ee4a559638b73910de1f9d/lib
    /Users/alexischangridel/.conan2/p/b/spdlo7f4174cde3d73/p/lib
    /Users/alexischangridel/.conan2/p/b/fmt091f5cc7d47ee/p/lib
)
target_link_options(game_engine PRIVATE
    -target
    arm64-apple-macos14.5
    -isysroot
    /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.5.sdk
    -lz
)
target_sources(game_engine PRIVATE
    src/infrastructure/input_manager.cpp
    src/infrastructure/renderer.cpp
    src/presentation/game_loop.cpp
    src/main.cpp
    include/game_engine/core/types.hpp
    include/game_engine/infrastructure/ecs_manager.hpp
    include/game_engine/infrastructure/input_manager.hpp
    include/game_engine/infrastructure/renderer.hpp
    include/game_engine/domain/system.hpp
    include/game_engine/domain/component.hpp
    include/game_engine/domain/entity.hpp
    include/game_engine/presentation/game_loop.hpp
)

set_target_properties(tests PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/arm64/release")

    tests
    include
)
